statements: SELECT user_id, age, gender, country, preferences FROM UserDemographics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT age, gender FROM UserDemographics WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM UserDemographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT country, preferences FROM UserDemographics WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM UserDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, country, preferences FROM UserDemographics WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY country ASC, user_id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, gender, age FROM UserDemographics WHERE country = 'USA' OR country = 'Canada' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, country, preferences FROM UserDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female' AND country = 'France'
SELECT user_id, age FROM UserDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM UserDemographics WHERE country = 'Germany' AND preferences->>'language' = 'English' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM media_preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' AND rating > 4.0;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, genre FROM users JOIN media_preferences ON users.user_id = media_preferences.user_id;
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, genre, rating FROM media_preferences WHERE rating >= 4.5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 ORDER BY age DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT gender, location FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 25;
SELECT media_title, genre, confidence_score FROM media_recommendations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT genre, SUM(watch_count) AS total_watch_count FROM preference_history GROUP BY genre;
SELECT user_id, media_title, genre, confidence_score FROM media_recommendations ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT media_title, genre FROM media_recommendations WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY confidence_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, genre, SUM(watch_count) AS total_watch_count FROM preference_history GROUP BY user_id, genre;
SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, media_title, confidence_score FROM media_recommendations WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM UserDemographics;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM UserDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM MediaRecommendations WHERE genre = 'Action' AND rating > 4;
SELECT media_title, genre, release_year FROM MediaDetails WHERE genre = 'Comedy' ORDER BY release_year;
SELECT user_id, media_title, rating FROM MediaRecommendations WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM UserDemographics
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM UserDemographics WHERE age >= 30
SELECT user_id, location FROM UserDemographics WHERE location='New York'
SELECT * FROM MediaRecommendations WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC
SELECT media_title, genre, release_year FROM MediaDetails WHERE genre='Action'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM media ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT media_title, genre FROM media WHERE media_type = 'Movie';
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender, location FROM users;
SELECT media_id, media_title, media_type, release_date, genre FROM media WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT user_id, preference_id, rating FROM user_preferences ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, income, education_level, marital_status FROM demographic_data WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT log_id, user_id, media_id, timestamp, action FROM recommendation_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
